name: Astray (itch) (Mauvemau)
description:
An Asteroids-like game built with Raylib!

Astray features the classic Asteroids game loop where you shoot asteroids to survive, with some neat Power Ups, and satisfying Gameplay Loop.

● Plot:
- A shipment of gold has been raided by Space Pirates, and your mission is to rescue the Stranded Astronauts, gather the Stolen Gold, and eliminate any Enemies on sight!

● Controls:
[Right Click] To accelerate towards the Mouse Position.
[Left Click] To Shoot.

● Credits:
Special Thanks to:
- Ray, for the Raylib library.
- HoliznaCC0, for the Music.
- 9KeyStudio, for the Explosion Animation.
- SFB Games, for Chiptone.

● Known Issues:
- The fire rate doesn't fire at a consistent tempo.
- The music might restart randomly if you're playing for a second time.
- The sound feels rather janky when the game is running slower than 60 frames per second.
- If you're using multiple monitors with the extended setting, the window might randomly consider all your monitors as a single one while changing resolutions.
